mapper.select: select e.employee_id, e.name, c.code_name c_position, c2.code_name c_employee_pattern, s.salary, s.commission_pct, e.hire_date, d.department_name from salary s join employees e on s.employee_id = e.employee_id join common_code c on e.employee_pattern = c.code_value join common_code c2 on e.position = c2.code_value join departments d on e.department_id = d.department_id
mapper.insert: insert into bonus (employee_id, bonus, bonus_date, bonus_comment) values (#{employee_id}, #{bonus}, #{bonus_date}, #{bonus_commnet})
